name: RummyFight
description:
Challenge friends and strangers in this exciting rummikub based game where you can play as many simultaneous fights as you like and each fight can be against 1-3 real opponents.

Rummikub is a very popular game worldwide where the goal is to create groups and runs with the numeric tiles on the board combined with the tiles on your rack. The first player to get rid of all tiles is the winner of the fight.

Play against people of all nationalities. Numbers have no language barriers!

Each time it's your turn in a fight, you will get a notification to your device and then you normally have 24 hours to make your meld (This time can vary from 5 minutes to 72 hours depending on the fight's creator). This means that you can leave the game at any times to do other things and then return when it's your turn again.

But you can also stay in a fight to see when your opponents play their tiles. RummyFight supports a feature we call Instant Update which means that you can see your opponents' moves immediately after they've done them.

RummyFight includes a Tutorial, Lobby Chat, In-Fight-Chat, Settings, Statistics, Rating System, Friends List, a hidden puzzle game called Tetpuz and lots more.

Discover the amazing game of Rummikub and realize how easy it is to learn... but how hard it is to master.
